content: our latest creation is a crochet pattern for a toy mouse for cats and kittens finished size approximately 7 cm long not including tail using dk/light worsted weight yarn and 2 75 mm hook you can use any yarn and hook combination that gives you good gauge normally this would be a hook at least two sizes smaller than that recommended on the yarn label changing the size of the hook/yarn will change the size of the mouse materials yarn crochet hook stuffing
